entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bachelors Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
